price: 34. Waxaanu dhab ahaan imtixaannay Sulaymaan, oo ku tuurnay kursigiisii oogo, markaasuu u soo laabtay (Alle)10.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ فَتَنَّا سُلَيۡمَٰنَ وَأَلۡقَيۡنَا عَلَىٰ كُرۡسِيِّهِۦ جَسَدٗا ثُمَّ أَنَابَ
footnotes: 10. Wuxuu u soo laabtay Alle isagoo toobad keen ah.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad fatannā sulaymāna wa-alqaynā ʿalā kur'siyyihi jasadan thumma anāba
